section.name: Turbine 2.2b1
section.p: This document describes what has changed in Turbine on the 2.x branch since 2.1.

subsection.name: Changes that could break older environments

ul.li: The Service interface was extended: Service.getName() since most Service implementations extend BaseService (which implements a public getName method), this should not be an issue.
ECS, Freemarker ans Webmacro services/modules are marked deprecated. You should use Velocity instead.
Castor service is marked as deprecated. You should use om/peer classes instead!
The XSLT Service is updated to use Xalan 2.0
Improved datatype mappings for mysql, oracle, postgresql, sapdb
adding support for secure connections in the xmlrpc service.
Fixed error in Mssql unique.vm template (removed a blank line)
[2301] Embedding message parts in HtmlEmail throws NullPointerException.
bugfix for BigDecimal attributes with default value
fixed handling of sequences for db2, postgresql, sapdb
fixes problem for postgres with blob style column in TurbineUser table. (Patch by Jerome Veryleyen)
